s.text: In addition, any effects of the winner's curse are offset by the fact that "losing" bidders become "winning" sellers when they re-auction products.

When I was interested in picking up the new smash hit Unreal , I went to eBay and saw that over the past month some 70 or so copies of that game had been auctioned for about $22 each.
Over the last five years I have bought one or two new video games a year, ones that seemed so great that they were worth the $50.
Now that consumers know that there is a fluid aftermarket for video games, they are more likely to go into a store and buy one of these games for full price on the day it comes out.
